title: Indian College Hostels
selftext:
Hello! 

I'm working on a project aimed at understanding telemedical requirements of hostel students. If you're a hostel student, could you please take a moment to complete this 2-minute survey and share it with your friends? 

Thank you!

Here's the survey link: https://forms.gle/a74KjsF7nC5WTjqC7
